#### *Linking Village-Level Data on Climatic Impact-Drivers, Socioeconomic Vulnerability, and Environmental Conditions to Health Impacts across 12 Philippine Cities*
</br>
</br>
The **Project CCHAIN dataset** is a validated, open-sourced linked dataset containing 20 years (2003-2022) of health, climate, environment, and socioeconomic variables at the barangay (village) level across 12 Philippine cities. 

# Quick links

- Access the data here:
    - [Google Drive](https://drive.google.com/drive/u/0/folders/1NF_e3YM0dVBSxlVBWRxGQXwkl59sp5Jf)
    - [Kaggle](https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/thinkdatasci/project-cchain/)
    - [HDX](https://data.humdata.org/dataset/project-cchain)
- See full data documentation [here](https://dbdocs.io/lacuna-fund-project-team/Project-CCHAIN) and documentation reports from partners [here](https://drive.google.com/drive/u/0/folders/1cATESCXBHDRyTDZT8s--UAEp7zcQ6jqV)
- To access the full household-level informal settlement community survey data, send your request for approval [here](https://forms.gle/Z9rfuJFENAQfbKeM6)
